sentences.en: Does such an attitudinal change reflect real experiences in daily life?
sentences.cn: 人生观的这种转变是否反映了日常生活中的真实经历？

sentences.en: Attitudinal warmth is considered very polite in the Chinese culture.
sentences.cn: 而态度热情在汉语文化中被认为是非常有礼貌的。

sentences.en: In Freetown many people greeted the indictment of the attitudinal-change officials as a joke.
sentences.cn: 在自由城，很多人将起诉态度改变的官员当成开玩笑的招呼语，但其他人根本笑不出来。
